entities.name: gilderoy
entities.description: Gilderoy is a person who has been deposed in his chair by the Healer. He is signing photographs of himself.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is a person to whom Gilderoy is throwing signed pictures into her lap.

entities.name: gladys gudgeon
entities.description: Gladys Gudgeon is a person who writes weekly fan mail to Gilderoy.

relationships.description: Gilderoy throws signed pictures into Ginny's lap.
Gilderoy receives fan mail from Gladys Gudgeon.
